name: Create or update records in Ninox for new entries from Cognito Forms
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically transferring new entries from Cognito Forms to Ninox. With this template, every time a new entry is submitted in Cognito Forms, Make will create or update the corresponding records in your Ninox database. This integration ensures that your data remains organized and up-to-date, allowing you to focus on what matters mostâ€”growing your business.
